channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This state's new trans sports restrictions hit with legal battles
item.description: The legal battle over a transgender sports ban in Nassau County in New York has begun.

item.description: Check out our top picks for the biggest and best deals from the Amazon Prime Day 2024 sale, happening right now.

item.title: 'Hellishly hot' southern Europe bakes under heat wave as temperatures top 104F
item.description: The Italian health ministry has placed 12 cities under the most severe heat warning as a wave of hot air from Africa is baking southern Europe

item.title: Sen. Bob Menendez's bribery verdict, and the charges he was found guilty of
item.description: New Jersey Sen. Bob Menendez and his wife, Nadine, were accused of accepting bribes of gold bars, stacks of cash and a Mercedes.

item.title: Sen. Bob Menendez found guilty on all counts in federal corruption trial
item.description: Federal prosecutors alleged that Sen. Bob Menendez accepted hundreds of thousands of dollars in bribes in exchange for the New Jersey Democrat's political clout.

item.title: Schumer calls for Menendez to resign after bribery conviction
item.description: Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer is calling on Sen. Bob Menendez to resign after a jury returned a guilty verdict in Menendez's bribery trial. CBS News congressional correspondent Nikole Killion has more on the fallout from the conviction on Capitol Hill.

item.title: RNC 2024 Day 2 updates: Vivek Ramaswamy says RNC speech to focus on 'national unity'
item.description: The theme of Tuesday's session is "Make America Safe Again."

item.title: Putin opens Moscow to St Petersburg motorway after 14 years of work

item.title: Authorities speak about Sen. Bob Menendez conviction
item.description: Sen. Bob Menendez, a New Jersey Democrat, was convicted Tuesday on federal charges of taking lucrative bribes, including cash and gold bars. Menendez's sentencing is scheduled for Oct. 29. Officials involved with the case gave brief statements after the verdict.
